import React from "react"; import uploadPreview from "../assets/Images/Upload-video-preview.jpg"; import Header from "../components/Header"; import axios from "axios"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Uploads(props) { const publishClick = (event) => { alert("Upload Successful!"); event.preventDefault(); axios .post("http://localhost:5000/videos", { title: event.target.videoTitle.value, channel: "Mohan Muruge", image: "https://i.imgur.com/vVp3k9a.jpg", description: event.target.videoDescription.value, views: "0", likes: "0", duration: "4:43", video: "https://ia800701.us.archive.org/26/items/SampleVideo1280x7205mb/SampleVideo_1280x720_5mb.mp4", comments: [], }) .then((res) => { props.history.replace("/"); }) .catch((err) => console.log(err)); }; const cancelClick = () => { props.history.goBack("/upload"); }; return ( //Included header component in here to display at the top of the page. //Links are in the header component to get to upload page <>

Upload Video





CANCEL
); }
